module.name: layered_interconnect_module_2d_design
module.keywords: module, interconnect, electrical, electronic, substrate, two dimensional, shape, design, layout

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of design features in an interconnect substrate using planar geometric models.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect module design, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1698;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1726.
